message: Let's start with a fair deal. I get 90% and you get 10%. I believe this will benefit us both in the long run.
Let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a good chunk, but I'm also keeping a fair share.  It's a better deal for both of us than waiting and seeing our money dwindle.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40 this time. I'm being reasonable, but I'm not giving away too much. Let's get this over with.
